description: Trapezoid of dot products of row 4 (signs alternating) with sequential 5-tuples read by rows in Pascal's triangle A007318: T(n,k) is the linear combination of the 5-tuples (C(4,0), -C(4,1), C(4,2), -C(4,3), C(4,4)) and (C(n-1,k-4), C(n-1,k-3), C(n-1,k-2), C(n-1,k-1), C(n-1,k)), n >= 1, 0 <= k <= n+3.
